synopsis.text:
Manga Time Kirara MAX's May 2021 issue brings exciting news for fans of Yui Hara's beloved Kiniro Mosaic manga - a new anime film is in production! The manga, which recently concluded its decade-long run, follows the heartwarming story of Shinobu Omiya and her friends as they navigate their final year of high school.

Shinobu, Alice Cartelet (who hails from England), Aya, and Yoko have forged an unbreakable bond, with even Karen, Honoka, and Kana becoming cherished members of their group. As they prepare for their senior trip to Nara and Kyoto, the girls must also face the daunting task of making plans for their futures.

While some, like Aya and Yoko, are focused on their upcoming entrance exams, Alice grapples with the decision to continue her education outside of Japan. Meanwhile, Shinobu finds herself on the cusp of an incredible opportunity she never thought possible.

Join the girls on their bittersweet journey as they create lasting memories, explore new horizons, and confront the challenges that come with growing up. Don't miss out on this touching and exciting adventure that promises to be a fitting farewell to this beloved group of friends!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
